name: Zomborg
description: It is the year 2000, and the United Nations has established several quarantine zones around the world to stem the tide of an unknown virus pandemic. The United Nations called upon a private military company, highly skilled mercenaries to retrieve the data and uncover the secret of the zone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics with shader model 2.0 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD7770 or GeForce GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Hardware
